message:
Update: He has been Reffered to Dhaka.. 
There is some financial trouble in his family. So if you can help please help him.. More details in comment 
#Urgent_Blood_Donation_Request

Dip, IBA-RU, 8th batch was shot in the eye while peacefully protesting in Pabna. He was initially taken to Pabna Sadar Hospital. 
Unfortunately, the doctors there could not treat him, and now he is in the RMC emergency room. He urgently needs B+ blood. Please help. 

Also, brothers and sisters in Rajshahi, please assist these kids in any way you can. They are all alone, as most RU aumni no longer reside in Rajshahi.

Contact: 017-36671809

Please help if possible.
condition: Shot in the eye, urgent treatment needed
